metadata.title: Challenges of Tourism in Northwestern Mexico Between Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua and San Luis Rio Colorado in the Face of COVID 19 Uncertainty

abstract.text: The manuscript refers to the challenge and the uncertainty in Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, and San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, for the pandemic (COVID 19). Like border cities.
